verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5023><s%> there was a feast <S%G1859><s%> of the Jews; <S%G2453><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> there is at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> by the sheep <S%G4262><s%> market a pool, <S%G2861><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G1951><s%> in the Hebrew <S%G1447><s%> tongue <S%G1447><s%> Bethesda, <S%G964><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> porches. <S%G4745><s%>

In these <S%G5025><s%> lay <S%G2621><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of weak <S%G770><s%> folk, of blind, <S%G5185><s%> halt, <S%G5560><s%> withered, <S%G3584><s%> waiting <S%G1551><s%> for the moving <S%G2796><s%> of the water. <S%G5204><s%>

For an angel <S%G32><s%> went <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> at <S%G2596><s%> a certain season <S%G2540><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> the pool, <S%G2861><s%> and troubled <S%G5015><s%> the water: <S%G5204><s%> whoever <S%G3588><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the troubling <S%G5015><s%> of the water <S%G5204><s%> stepped <S%G1684><s%> in was made <S%G1096><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%> of whatever <S%G1221><s%> disease <S%G3553><s%> he had. <S%G2722><s%>
And a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> was there, <S%G1563><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> an infirmity <S%G769><s%> thirty <S%G5144><s%> and eight <S%G3638><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him lie, <S%G2621><s%> and knew <S%G1097><s%> that he had been <S%G2192><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> a long <S%G4183><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> in that case, he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Will <S%G2309><s%> you be made <S%G1096><s%> whole? <S%G5199><s%>

The weak <S%G770><s%> man answered <S%G611><s%> him, Sir, <S%G2962><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> is troubled, <S%G5015><s%> to put <S%G906><s%> me into <S%G1519><s%> the pool: <S%G2861><s%> but while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I am coming, <S%G2064><s%> another <S%G243><s%> steps <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me.
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Rise, <S%G1453><s%> take <S%G142><s%> up your bed, <S%G2895><s%> and walk. <S%G4043><s%>

And immediately <S%G2112><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> whole, <S%G5199><s%> and took <S%G142><s%> up his bed, <S%G2895><s%> and walked: <S%G4043><s%> and on <S%G1722><s%> the same <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> was the sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him that was cured, <S%G2323><s%> It is the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day: it is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> for you to carry <S%G142><s%> your bed. <S%G2895><s%>
He answered <S%G611><s%> them, He that made <S%G4160><s%> me whole, <S%G5199><s%> the same <S%G1565><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to me, Take <S%G142><s%> up your bed, <S%G2895><s%> and walk. <S%G4043><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> they him, What <S%G3739><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is that which <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to you, Take <S%G142><s%> up your bed, <S%G2895><s%> and walk? <S%G4043><s%>

And he that was healed <S%G2390><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> not who <S%G5101><s%> it was: for Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had conveyed <S%G1593><s%> himself away, <S%G1593><s%> a multitude <S%G3793><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> in that place. <S%G5117><s%>

Afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> finds <S%G2147><s%> him in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Behold, <S%G2396><s%> you are made <S%G1096><s%> whole: <S%G5199><s%> sin <S%G264><s%> no <S%G3371><s%> more, <S%G3371><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> a worse <S%G5501><s%> thing come <S%G1096><s%> to you.
The man <S%G444><s%> departed, <S%G565><s%> and told <S%G312><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> that it was Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> had made <S%G4160><s%> him whole. <S%G5199><s%>

And therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> did the Jews <S%G2453><s%> persecute <S%G1377><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and sought <S%G2212><s%> to slay <S%G615><s%> him, because <S%G3754><s%> he had done <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day.
But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, My Father <S%G3962><s%> works <S%G2038><s%> till now, <S%G2193><s%> <S%G737><s%> and I work. <S%G2038><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> the more <S%G3123><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> him, because <S%G3754><s%> he not only <S%G3440><s%> had broken <S%G3089><s%> the sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> but said <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> was his Father, <S%G3962><s%> making <S%G4160><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> equal <S%G2470><s%> with God. <S%G2316><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, The Son <S%G5207><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> of himself, <S%G1438><s%> but what <S%G5100><s%> he sees <S%G991><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> do: <S%G4160><s%> for what <S%G5100><s%> things soever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> he does, <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> does <S%G4160><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

For the Father <S%G3962><s%> loves <S%G5368><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> and shows <S%G1166><s%> him all <S%G3956><s%> things that himself <S%G846><s%> does: <S%G4160><s%> and he will show <S%G1166><s%> him greater <S%G3187><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> than these, <S%G5130><s%> that you may marvel. <S%G2296><s%>

For as the Father <S%G3962><s%> raises <S%G1453><s%> up the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and vivifies <S%G2227><s%> them; even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> vivifies <S%G2227><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he will. <S%G2309><s%>
For the Father <S%G3962><s%> judges <S%G2919><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man, <S%G3762><s%> but has committed <S%G1325><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> to the Son: <S%G5207><s%>

That all <S%G3956><s%> men should honor <S%G5091><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as they honor <S%G5091><s%> the Father. <S%G3962><s%> He that honors <S%G5091><s%> not the Son <S%G5207><s%> honors <S%G5091><s%> not the Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> has sent <S%G3992><s%> him.

Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, He that hears <S%G191><s%> my word, <S%G3056><s%> and believes <S%G4100><s%> on him that sent <S%G3992><s%> me, has <S%G2192><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and shall not come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> condemnation; <S%G2920><s%> but is passed <S%G3327><s%> from death <S%G2288><s%> to life. <S%G2222><s%>

Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, The hour <S%G5610><s%> is coming, <S%G2064><s%> and now <S%G3568><s%> is, when <S%G3753><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> shall hear <S%G191><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> and they that hear <S%G191><s%> shall live. <S%G2198><s%>

For as the Father <S%G3962><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> in himself; <S%G1438><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> has he given <S%G1325><s%> to the Son <S%G5207><s%> to have <S%G2192><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> in himself; <S%G1438><s%>
And has given <S%G1325><s%> him authority <S%G1849><s%> to execute <S%G4160><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he is the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man. <S%G444><s%>

Marvel <S%G2296><s%> not at this: <S%G5124><s%> for the hour <S%G5610><s%> is coming, <S%G2064><s%> in the which <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that are in the graves <S%G3419><s%> shall hear <S%G191><s%> his voice, <S%G5456><s%>

And shall come <S%G1607><s%> forth; <S%G1607><s%> they that have done <S%G4160><s%> good, <S%G18><s%> to the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of life; <S%G2222><s%> and they that have done <S%G4238><s%> evil, <S%G5337><s%> to the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of damnation. <S%G2920><s%>

I can <S%G1410><s%> of my <S%G1683><s%> own self <S%G1683><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> nothing: <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%> as I hear, <S%G191><s%> I judge: <S%G2919><s%> and my judgment <S%G2920><s%> is just; <S%G1342><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I seek <S%G2212><s%> not my <S%G1699><s%> own will, <S%G2307><s%> but the will <S%G2307><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> has sent <S%G3992><s%> me.
If <S%G1437><s%> I bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of myself, <S%G1683><s%> my witness <S%G3141><s%> is not true. <S%G227><s%>

There is another <S%G243><s%> that bears <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of me; and I know <S%G1492><s%> that the witness <S%G3141><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he witnesses <S%G3140><s%> of me is true. <S%G227><s%>
You sent <S%G649><s%> to John, <S%G2491><s%> and he bore <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> to the truth. <S%G225><s%>
But I receive <S%G2983><s%> not testimony <S%G3141><s%> from man: <S%G444><s%> but these <S%G5023><s%> things I say, <S%G3004><s%> that you might be saved. <S%G4982><s%>
He was a burning <S%G2545><s%> and a shining <S%G5316><s%> light: <S%G3088><s%> and you were willing <S%G2309><s%> for a season <S%G5610><s%> to rejoice <S%G21><s%> in his light. <S%G5457><s%>

But I have <S%G2192><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> than that of John: <S%G2491><s%> for the works <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> me to finish, <S%G5048><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> that I do, <S%G4160><s%> bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of me, that the Father <S%G3962><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> me.

And the Father <S%G3962><s%> himself, <S%G846><s%> which has sent <S%G3992><s%> me, has borne witness <S%G3140><s%> of me. You have neither <S%G3777><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> his voice <S%G5456><s%> at <S%G4455><s%> any <S%G4455><s%> time, <S%G4455><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> his shape. <S%G1491><s%>
And you have <S%G2192><s%> not his word <S%G3056><s%> abiding <S%G3306><s%> in you: for whom <S%G3739><s%> he has sent, <S%G649><s%> him you believe <S%G4100><s%> not.

Search <S%G2045><s%> the scriptures; <S%G1124><s%> for in them you think <S%G1380><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life: <S%G2222><s%> and they are they which testify <S%G3140><s%> of me.
And you will <S%G2309><s%> not come <S%G2064><s%> to me, that you might have <S%G2192><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
I receive <S%G2983><s%> not honor <S%G1391><s%> from men. <S%G444><s%>
But I know <S%G1097><s%> you, that you have <S%G2192><s%> not the love <S%G26><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in you.

I am come <S%G2064><s%> in my Father's <S%G3962><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> and you receive <S%G2983><s%> me not: if <S%G1437><s%> another <S%G243><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> in his own <S%G2398><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> him you will receive. <S%G2983><s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> you believe, <S%G4100><s%> which receive <S%G2983><s%> honor <S%G1391><s%> one <S%G240><s%> of another, <S%G240><s%> and seek <S%G2212><s%> not the honor <S%G1391><s%> that comes from God <S%G2316><s%> only? <S%G3441><s%>

Do <S%G4160><s%> not think <S%G1380><s%> that I will accuse <S%G2723><s%> you to the Father: <S%G3962><s%> there is one that accuses <S%G2723><s%> you, even Moses, <S%G3475><s%> in whom <S%G3739><s%> you trust. <S%G1679><s%>
For had you believed <S%G4100><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> you would have <S%G2192><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> me; for he wrote <S%G1125><s%> of me.
But if <S%G1487><s%> you believe <S%G4100><s%> not his writings, <S%G1121><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall you believe <S%G4100><s%> my words? <S%G4487><s%>
